data.name: Necromunda: Hired Gun - Escher Skin Pack
data.detailed_description:
Pick your contracts. Hunt your targets. Collect the bounty.

If you’re going out hunting, you best do it in your fanciest getup. The Escher Skin Pack DLC includes an Escher-themed outfit and serrated dagger skin. Your loyal doggo sports a threatening mottled black fur, and can be directed with an Escher chew toy.
data.about_the_game:
Pick your contracts. Hunt your targets. Collect the bounty.

If you’re going out hunting, you best do it in your fanciest getup. The Escher Skin Pack DLC includes an Escher-themed outfit and serrated dagger skin. Your loyal doggo sports a threatening mottled black fur, and can be directed with an Escher chew toy.
data.short_description: If you’re going out hunting, you best do it in your fanciest getup. The Escher Skin Pack DLC includes an Escher-themed outfit and knife skin, along with a new look for both your mastiff and his chew toy.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian, German*, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: AMD FX 6300 X6 / Intel Core i5-3570K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB VRAM, Radeon HD 7770 / GeForce GTX 560 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 30 FPS, 1920x1080 in low.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2600 / Intel Core i5-8600K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 6 GB VRAM, Radeon RX 5600 / GeForce GTX 1660
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 60 FPS, 1920x1080 in epic.
